title: Heart of Eve
description: My vow of celibacy has never been broken nor tempted, not even when the plague thrust me into a lawless, brutal world.So why did God send the only surviving woman to a priest? To test me? Or to save me?*This is a 10,000-word novelette and can be read as an introduction to the Trilogy of Eve or as bonus material between the other books. It was previously published in the For the First Time anthology.
author: Pam Godwin
